fixes.name: Selected Metric Value
fixes.dax_expression:
SWITCH(
    SELECTEDVALUE('Select Metric'[Display As]),
    "Likes", SUM('test+'[Likes_Received_Per_Day]),
    "Posts", SUM('test+'[Posts_Per_Day]),
    "Messages", SUM('test+'[Messages_Sent_Per_Day]),
    BLANK()
)
fixes.solution_explanation: Replaced CASE on parameter with SWITCH. Parameter [Parameters].[Select Metric] -> SELECTEDVALUE('Select Metric'[Display As]). Aggregations SUM(...) preserved and column references converted to 'test+'[ColumnName]. Returned BLANK() when no match.
